rules.natural: If the research division has funding for Project Alpha, then the research division achieves its annual target milestone
If the research division faces a lawsuit from Competitor Inc, then the research division enters litigation with Competitor Inc
If Project Alpha passes review by the technical committee, then should the research division not have funding for Project Alpha, the research division does not receive emergency funding
If the research division develops a prototype of Device X, then the research division achieves its annual target milestone
If the research division conducts field testing of Device X, then the research division achieves its annual target milestone
If the research division secures partnership with a tech giant, then the research division develops a prototype of Device X
The research division secures partnership with a tech giant or the research division forms a consortium with a university network
If the research division forms a consortium with a university network, then the research division establishes a field testing facility laboratory
If the research division establishes a field testing facility laboratory, then the research division conducts field testing of Device X
If it is not the case that publishing a paper on breakthrough findings leads to receiving a patent for the core technology, then the research division faces a lawsuit from Competitor Inc
If the research division does not have funding for Project Alpha, then the research division receives emergency funding
If Project Alpha does not pass review by the technical committee, then the research division publishes a paper on breakthrough findings
If Project Alpha does not pass review by the technical committee, then Project Alpha receives approval from the management board

Project Alpha does not receive approval from the management board
